member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_CBR
member.summary: Represents a rate control structure definition for constant bitrate mode.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_CBR.InitialQP
member.summary: When is enabled, allows the Initial QP to be used by the rate control algorithm.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_CBR.MinQP
member.summary: When is enabled, limits QP range of the rate control algorithm.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_CBR.MaxQP
member.summary: When is enabled, limits QP range of the rate control algorithm.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_CBR.MaxFrameBitSize
member.summary: Maximum size in bits for each frame to be coded. When is enabled, limits each frame maximum size in the rate control algorithm.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_CBR.TargetBitRate
member.summary: Specifies the constant bitrate to be used in bits/second.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_CBR.VBVCapacity
member.summary: When is enabled, specifies the capacity in bits of the Video Buffer Verifier to be used in the rate control algorithm.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_CBR.InitialVBVFullness
member.summary: When is enabled, specifies the initial fullness in bits of the Video Buffer Verifier to be used in the rate control algorithm.
